extendedInfo.description: FREE LITE version let's you jump in an explore the Dark Nova Universe! If you enjoy the game please give us a good rating and consider buying the Full Version with many more Ships, Quests, and Missions to enjoy!Classic SciFi RPG style play. Design your character and warp around a Universe with over 100 systems. If you love SciFi like Star Wars, Star Trek, Serenity, Firefly, Battlestar Galactica, or Babylon 5 you'll probably love Dark Nova!.  Open ended RPG gameplay inspired by classic space games like Elite, Privateer, Star Control, EV Nova, Sundog, Freelancer, Starflight and more! Be a Trader, Pirate, Smuggler, maybe a Bounty Hunter. Build your ship and your skills and follow your destiny! Trek through the stars on quests and adventures. Trade in space and at ports! Encounter mysterious alien races. Transport passengers but beware some may bring unwanted attention to you. Dark Nova is the official conversion of the classic Palm Pilot game Space Trader with new graphical, sound, and gameplay content.***Thanks to everyone who has emailed us with suggestions! We are constantly working to improve the app!Please Visit http://darknova.net and send us your suggestions.Follow @dead_jim on Twitter for Dark Nova updates

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: I\'m a fan of the Escape Velocity series (Mac/PC space trading/fighting/exploring games) and out of all the other apps in the market right now, this game is the most similar.  I like it a lot and plan to buy the full version when it\'s time to upgrade my ship.  My phone is a Samsung Galaxy S and occasionally if I click on an event in a planet my screen will dim and nothing will happen.  Turning my phone\'s display on/off helps so that is a minor bug but doesn\'t ruin the game at all.  Great job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kool
reviews.comment: This is a fun little game. All users should try lite games before buying full games. This is a game that works well on my pantech. I look forward to playing full game.
reviews.author: Michael Wakely

reviews.title: Might be good
reviews.comment: Would be good if was explained more and map was a bit more detailed, also can\'t fig out how to buy stuff other than the traders u run into, also its so hard to make $ at first.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good for 5 seconds
reviews.comment: Lite limits to weakest 2 lame ships? lame  Gameplay promising but not worth it with the ships  Unable to exit app no option to exit completly just stuck at new game and load screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too easy
reviews.comment: Seems to easy and the full version is too expensive. Might pay a buck or two for the full version but definitely not four bucks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too limited
reviews.comment: As previously mentioned the game is too limited on the light version and im not going to pay \302\2432.54 just so i can have the ability to buy a ship with a laser, as thats all your paying for the ability to fight back and the removal of the nag screen telling you to buy premium!  When playing the lite version there are a few things that will happen. 1. You start to travel get shot go KABOOM! 2. You flee and get to flee another day 3. You buy the second ship, escape pod, shield and cloaking device and keep trading but that gets boring after 5minutes.  Full version is worth probably \302\2431 for what the game is at the moment and lite version needs to let you test out the game more as for now though im removing the game its boring.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ugly
reviews.comment: Identical game play as the palm pilot version I loved. But, they\'ve made a horrifically ugly game with poorly illustrated backgrounds on every screen that makes legibility almost impossible. Add a poorly organized control scheme, and it seems like esthetic game design was an afterthought here. I would love to play this game but it is just too ugly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like EVN
reviews.comment: Good stuff. Would love a game like this, mixed with some rpg first person. Fly around, land, but be able to actually walk around and explore a tad on all types of worlds. Hopefully bungies new game will be like that... Fingers crossed.
reviews.author: Nate Lane

reviews.title: Bit crap
reviews.comment: The lie edition is too lite not worth it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad UI - No Longer Updated
reviews.comment: App hasn\'t been updated in a couple years. User interface does not scale well at all to larger screens.  Full version is over priced for an Android game, that hasn\'t been updated in two years.
reviews.author: Andrew Diamond

reviews.title: Might be good
reviews.comment: Enjoyed the original on the palm. but this UI is so poor there seems no way to buy cargo....
